content.p: The Incident Reporting System is for any accident, near miss, dangerous occurrence or ill-health inciden on University premises or involving University-related activity off-site. e.g. falls, manual handling injuries, eye injuries, being struck by something, striking against something, sharps injuries, violence, chemical exposure where someone narrowly avoided being injured e.g. collapse of scaffolding, falls of materials from height, explosion, asbestos release occupationally caused ill-health such as sensitisation, latex allergy, deafness, upper limb disorders. Also can be used for recording ill-health not related to work activity, e.g. cardiac arrest, loss of consciousness. First aiders attending any incident will want to know that a record of the incident has been submitted. Report an accident Report a Fire Emergency procedures Pharmacy Building (Building 63) University Park University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD Telephone: Telephone: +44 (0)115 9513401 Email: h&s@nottingham.ac.uk
